Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Actors: Andrew Garfield, Richard Pyros, Jacob Warner, Milo Gibson
Plot: WWII American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to win the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Pearl Harbor
Actors: Ben Affleck, Josh Hartnett, Kate Beckinsale, William Lee Scott
Plot: Pearl Harbor follows the story of two best friends, Rafe and Danny, and their love lives as they go off to join the war.
